questions_and_notes: Note that several area_fractions are defined earlier, which are distinguished using different variable root names.  vegFrac-Emon and vegFrac-Eyr are defined (for monthly and yearly sampling), and for consistency the daily variable defined here should also be named vegFrac.  Again for consistency, it should have a standard name area_fraction and a cell_methods "area: time: mean".  Note that the description and the comment are inconsistent.  If the canopy fraction is required, then a different root name is needed (e.g., canopyFrac).  Finally, does vegetation fraction really change significantly on daily time-scales?
comment: Percentage of area covered by vegetation.
